div_aria-hidden_style:
To ensure that an element with `aria-hidden="true"` is not focusable and does not contain focusable elements, you should add `tabindex="-1"` to the element and any focusable child elements. This will prevent the element and its focusable children from being part of the tab order. Here's an example: ```
Link
``` In this example, the `div` element and its focusable children (input, button, and link) all have `tabindex="-1"` attribute, which means they will not be focusable using the keyboard.
